title: 8-17  Mersenne prime
description:
A prime number is called a Mersenne prime if it can be written in the form of
2^p - 1 for some positive integer p. Write a program that finds the number of
Mersenne primes with p<=n, n is a specified integer.
output: The number of Mersenne primes with p <= n.
author: 程序设计I Chapter5 Functions
